properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chincoteague to Parramore Island VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Chincoteague VA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Parramore Island to Cape Charles Light VA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued January 11 at 2:24PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt. Seas 5 to 8 ft. For the Low Water Advisory,
abnormally low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Fenwick Island DE to Cape Charles
Light VA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM
EST Sunday. For the Low Water Advisory, from midnight tonight
to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
